short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Links and displays RMP/GatorEvals data while searching for classes on ONE.UF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Hover over designated search icons to preview queried results
- Click on designated icons to open respective web pages (RMP/Evals)
- Easy and automatic installation - only runs when you access a UF course registration page

source code: https://github.com/jereme-yang/rate-my-prufessors



version 3.0
- added gator evals data
- added caching to reduce API requests
- added default "Not found" popup

version 2.0
- changed UI/UX:
     1. Hyperlinked data
     2. html popup containing preview of data
     3. overall rating shown to the right of professor mimicking RMP theme
- support for multi professor courses
- improving input/output filtering to prevent false positive results

version 1.0.0
- initial launch
